sentences.en: A back injury forced her to withdraw from Wimbledon.
sentences.cn: 背部受伤使她不得不退出温布尔登赛事。

sentences.en: A racing injury forced Stephen Roche to pull out.
sentences.cn: 一次比赛中的受伤使斯蒂芬·罗奇不得不退出。

sentences.en: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.cn: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.en: Canseco, nursing a back injury, struck out.
sentences.cn: 坎塞科因背部受伤而三振出局。

sentences.en: He had to spend two years bedridden with an injury.
sentences.cn: 他因伤不得不卧床两年。

sentences.en: He is recovering from a knee injury.
He made a remarkable recovery from a shin injury.
sentences.cn: 他的胫骨伤恢复得相当不错。

sentences.en: He needed surgery to cure a troublesome back injury.
sentences.cn: 他需要做手术来治好烦人的背伤。

sentences.en: He was out of work owing to a physical injury.
He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.cn: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

sentences.en: Mark was lying unconscious but with no outward sign of injury.
sentences.cn: 马克躺在那儿昏迷不醒，但看不出受伤的迹象。

sentences.en: She was awarded £3,500 for injury to her feelings.
sentences.cn: 她判得3,500英镑精神损失赔偿。

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.cn: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.en: The goalkeeper was stretchered off just before half-time with a rib injury.
sentences.cn: 就在中场休息前，该守门员由于肋骨受伤被用担架抬下场。

sentences.en: The pilot ejected from the plane and escaped injury.
sentences.cn: 飞行员从飞机中弹出，安然无恙。

sentences.en: The treatment regime may vary widely depending on the type of injury.
sentences.cn: 因受伤类型不同治疗方法可能有很大的区别。

sentences.en: The victim suffered a dreadful injury and lost a lot of blood.
sentences.cn: 受害者受了重伤，大量失血。

sentences.en: Walking with weights makes the shoulders very susceptible to injury.
sentences.cn: 负重行走时肩膀很容易受伤。

phrases.tran_cn: 雪上加霜；伤害之外又加侮辱
n. 寒害，冷害；冷却损伤

trans.tran_en: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack
